data.description: Salesforce is the Customer Success Platform. Our social and mobile cloud technologies—including our flagship sales and CRM applications—help companies connect with customers, partners, and employees in entirely new ways.

relatedRecords.name: DevFest Ranchi 2019
relatedRecords.description: DevFests are large, community-run developer events happening around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies. Hosted by GDG Ranchi, DevFest Ranchi will cover multiple product areas such as Android, Google Assistant, Firebase / Identity, Google Cloud Platform, …
